item.title: Palantir 季度业绩未能给投资者留下深刻印象，股价跳水
item.description: Palantir Technologies 的股价在周二的盘前交易中下跌了约 7%，此前的季度业绩和上调的预期未能达到华尔街投资者的高预期，而投资者在财报发布前曾推动股价大幅上涨。【原文：Shares of Palantir Technologies slumped about 7% in premarket trading on Tuesday, after quarterly results and a raised forecast failed to meet the high expectations of Wall Street investors, who had driven the stock price up significantly ahead of earnings.】

item.title: 报告称，M&S 和 Co-op 网络攻击者欺骗 IT 服务台重置密码
item.description: 据技术专业网站 BleepingComputer 报道，对英国玛莎百货和 Co-op 集团的网络攻击始于黑客冒充员工与零售商的 IT 服务台联系。【原文：Cyberattacks on Britain's Marks & Spencer and Co-op Group started with hackers impersonating employees while contacting the retailers' IT help desks, technology specialist site BleepingComputer reported.】

item.title: 印度 Paytm 因股票期权成本导致连续亏损扩大
item.description: 印度 Paytm 公司周二报告称，由于一次性员工股票期权成本影响了盈利，3 月份季度连续亏损扩大。【原文：India's Paytm on Tuesday reported a wider sequential loss for the March quarter as one-time employee stock option costs weighed on earnings.】

item.title: ADM 公布第一季度利润增长
item.description: 谷物贸易商 Archer-Daniels-Midland 周二公布的第一季度利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于其营养品部门的强劲表现和较低的成本。【原文：Grain trader Archer-Daniels-Midland on Tuesday beat Wall Street expectations for first-quarter profit, helped by robust performance in its nutrition segment and lower costs.】

item.title: 旅游需求放缓，万豪下调 2025 年收入展望
item.description: 本周二，酒店运营商万豪国际集团（Marriott International）下调了其 2025 年客房收入预期，因为该公司正准备应对因关税引发的对经济衰退的担忧而导致的美国旅游需求放缓。【原文：Hotel operator Marriott International trimmed its 2025 room revenue forecast on Tuesday, as it braces for slowing travel demand in the U.S. amid tariffs-induced fears of an economic recession.】

item.title: 印度小组将审查版权法，应对 OpenAI 面临的法律挑战
item.description: 一份官方备忘录显示，印度已成立一个小组，审查现行版权法是否足以解决与人工智能有关的纠纷，而此时，OpenAI 正面临着因被指控利用版权材料而引发的法律挑战。【原文：India has set up a panel to review if existing copyright law is sufficient to tackle AI-related disputes, an official memo showed, at a time when OpenAI faces legal challenges stemming from accusations of exploiting copyrighted material.】

item.title: 法拉利第一季度盈利增长 15%，但确认面临美国关税风险
item.description: 豪华跑车制造商法拉利周二表示，在更丰富的产品组合和个性化汽车需求的支持下，第一季度的核心盈利增长了 15%，但重申美国关税可能会打击今年的盈利能力。【原文：Luxury sports-car maker Ferrari said on Tuesday its core earnings rose 15% in the first quarter supported by a richer product mix and demand for personalisation of vehicles, but reiterated U.S. tariffs could hit profitability this year】

item.title: 优步与中国 Pony AI 合作，在中东重要市场部署自动驾驶出租车
item.description: 优步（Uber）周二表示，它将与 Pony AI 合作，在其打车平台上部署这家中国机器人出租车开发商的车辆，这是优步为加强其在新兴机器人出租车领域的影响力而进行的一系列合作中的最新举措。【原文：Uber said on Tuesday it was partnering with Pony AI to deploy the China-based robotaxi developer's vehicles onto its ride-hailing platform, marking the latest in a series of tie-ups aimed at strengthening its presence in the fledgling robotaxi sector.】

item.title: 汉莎航空董事长宣布离职，寻找继任者的工作已步入正轨
item.description: 汉莎航空董事长卡尔-路德维格-克莱（Karl-Ludwig Kley）在周二举行的年度投资者会议上表示，他将不再竞选德国航空集团监事会主席一职，并补充说，寻找 2026 年继任者的工作正在按部就班地进行。【原文：Lufthansa Chairman Karl-Ludwig Kley will not run again as head of the German airline group's supervisory board, he told an annual investors' meeting on Tuesday, adding that the search for a successor in 2026 was on track.】

item.title: 台湾寿险公司的投资组合中存在数十亿美元的未对冲资产
item.description: 随着保险公司、养老基金和其他投资者放弃美元资产或争相对冲美元风险，台湾货币创下前所未有的涨幅，并创下三年来的新高。【原文：Taiwan's currency is at three-year highs after notching unprecedented gains as insurance firms, pension funds and other investors quit U.S. dollar assets or scramble to hedge exposure.】

item.title: 早间竞价：亚洲外汇市场震荡，默茨跌跌撞撞
item.description: 金融与市场》无任所编辑 Mike Dolan 为您解读当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：A look at what matters in U.S. and global markets today from Mike Dolan, Editor-At-Large, Finance and Markets】

item.title: 美元的避风港光环在美联储、财政和贸易焦虑中闪烁：路透调查
item.description: 接受路透社调查的大多数外汇策略师预测，由于担心经济下滑，未来一年全球储备货币将进一步下跌。【原文：Concerns are mounting about the dollar's safe haven appeal, according to a majority of FX strategists surveyed by Reuters who forecast the global reserve currency will decline further over the coming year amid fears of an economic downturn.】

item.title: 制药业可能被征收关税，美股期货下跌；福特汽车下调业绩预期
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货走低，此前唐纳德-特朗普总统关于可能对制药业征收关税的言论再次引发了人们对贸易战影响的担忧，而一些业绩不佳的企业也拖累了投资者的情绪。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were lower on Tuesday after President Donald Trump's comments on potential pharma tariffs renewed worries of the impact of a trade war, while some downbeat corporate results also weighed on investor sentiment.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司重申2025年前景，称美国关税影响 "有限
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周二重申了其全年交付和财务前景，并表示美国迄今征收的关税 "影响有限"，不会影响其第一季度业绩。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer on Tuesday reaffirmed its full-year delivery and financial outlook, and said that tariffs imposed by the United States so far had "limited impact" that did not affect its first-quarter results.】

item.title: 特朗普 "解放日 "后并购交易签约创 20 年新低
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普于 4 月 2 日发动全球贸易战之后，银行家和首席执行官们纷纷踩下了并购的刹车，签订的交易比 COVID-19 大流行和 2008 年全球金融危机最惨淡的时期还要少。【原文：Bankers and CEOs hit the brakes on mergers and acquisitions after U.S. President Donald Trump launched a global trade war on April 2, with fewer deals getting signed than during the bleakest days of the COVID-19 pandemic and the 2008 global financial crisis.】

item.title: 特斯拉四月份德国汽车销量减少近一半
item.description: 德国道路交通机构 KBA 周二表示，特斯拉 4 月份在德国的销量几乎减少了一半，尽管电池电动汽车的销量总体上有所增长。【原文：Tesla's sales volume in Germany nearly halved in April, German road traffic agency KBA said on Tuesday, even as sales of battery electric vehicles rose overall.】

item.title: 聚焦：特朗普加征关税，加拿大企业从美国转向新市场
item.description: 一家为制药业生产胶囊和片剂的制造商正在亚洲寻找新的合作伙伴。一家在美国拥有 35 年客户基础的钢铁零部件制造商正在告诉客户，预计将支付更高的价格。另一家为体育或学校活动生产吉祥物服装的公司正在降低价格，以免失去美国客户。【原文：A manufacturer of capsules and tablets for the pharmaceuticals industry is scouting Asia for new partners. A steel component maker, with a client base in the United States stretching back 35 years, is telling customers to expect to pay higher prices. Another company, that produces mascot costumes for sporting or school events, is lowering its prices so as not to lose American customers.】

item.title: 香港推出新措施吸引更多科技和生物企业上市
item.description: 香港周二推出了一项计划，为科技公司在其证券交易所上市提供更多便利，因为香港希望利用中国公司日益增长的离岸融资欲望。【原文：Hong Kong launched a scheme on Tuesday to offer smoother listings for tech companies on its stock exchange, as it looks to capitalize on Chinese companies' growing appetite to raise funds offshore.】

item.title: 多伦多 4 月成屋销售回吐近期跌幅
item.description: 多伦多地区地产局周二的数据显示，大多伦多地区4月份的房屋销售量比3月份有所上升，但比去年4月份大幅下降，原因是购房者考虑到加拿大和美国之间的贸易紧张局势。【原文：Greater Toronto Area home sales rose in April from March but were down sharply from April last year, as homebuyers weighed trade tensions between Canada and the United States, Toronto Regional Real Estate Board data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧洲冷落马斯克，特斯拉英国 4 月销量两年多来最低
item.description: 研究机构 New AutoMotive 周二发布的数据显示，即使在电动汽车需求上升的情况下，特斯拉 4 月份在英国的新车销量仍同比暴跌 62%，创两年多来最低。【原文：Tesla's new car sales in Britain plummeted 62% year-on-year in April to their lowest in over two years, even as demand for electric vehicles rose, data from research group New AutoMotive showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧盟在准备应对美国扩大关税时保持开放态度
item.description: 欧盟贸易委员马罗斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）周二表示，欧盟将针对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在90天暂停期间对欧盟进口产品征收的大量关税准备反制措施，并将所有选项摆在桌面上。【原文：The European Union will prepare countermeasures to the multitude of U.S. tariffs imposed on EU imports during President Donald Trump's 90-day pause, with all options on the table, European Trade Commissioner Maros Sefcovic said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 亚洲危机逆转"，货币因美元而飙升
item.description: 随着世界出口大国开始质疑几十年来将巨额贸易顺差投资于美国资产的趋势，亚洲出现的美元抛售潮对美元来说是一个不祥之兆。【原文：A wave of dollar selling in Asia is an ominous sign for the greenback as the world's export powerhouse starts to question a decades-long trend of investing its big trade surpluses in U.S. assets.】

item.title: 行业组织称欧盟应将半导体支出翻两番
item.description: 行业组织 SEMI 周二在对欧盟即将出台的投资预算磋商做出正式回应时表示，欧盟应将芯片支出翻两番，并为其分配单独的预算。【原文：The European Union should quadruple its spending on chips and allocate a separate budget for it, industry group SEMI said on Tuesday in its official response to EU consultations for its upcoming investment budget.】

item.title: 兰博基尼季度收入增长 29.6%，混合动力车型推动交付量增长
item.description: 意大利豪华跑车制造商兰博基尼周二报告称，尽管全球形势复杂，但受其新型混合动力车 Revuelto 和 Urus SE 全球强劲需求的推动，公司收入猛增 29.6%，达到 8.952 亿欧元。【原文：Italian luxury sports carmaker Lamborghini reported on Tuesday a 29.6% jump in revenue to 895.2 million euros, driven by strong global demand for its new hybrid models, the Revuelto and Urus SE, despite the complex global scenario.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Aurizon 公司裁员 200 人，全年盈利可能受挫
item.description: 澳大利亚铁路货运运营商 Aurizon Holdings 周二盘后表示，在对其非经营性成本基础进行持续评估后，该公司正寻求在其业务范围内裁减 200 个全职岗位。【原文：Australia's Aurizon Holdings is looking to potentially cut 200 full-time job roles across its business after an ongoing assessment of its non-operational cost base, the rail freight operator said post trading hours on Tuesday.】

item.title: 新加坡海湾银行任命前美联储副主席为新成立的全球顾问委员会成员
item.description: 新加坡海湾银行（Singapore Gulf Bank）周二表示，已任命前美国联邦储备委员会副主席兰道尔-夸尔斯（Randal Quarles）为新成立的全球顾问委员会副主席，以支持这家数字贷款机构的国际发展战略。【原文：Singapore Gulf Bank said on Tuesday that it has appointed former U.S. Federal Reserve vice chair Randal Quarles as vice chairman of its newly formed global advisory board to support the digital lender's international growth strategy.】

item.title: 办公空间提供商 IWG 第一季度收入增长，维持全年预期
item.description: 办公空间提供商 IWG 周二公布第一季度全系统收入增长 2%，并确认了其年度预期，称其核心业务并未受到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收贸易关税的直接影响。【原文：Office space provider IWG posted a 2% rise in first-quarter system-wide revenue on Tuesday and affirmed its annual forecast, saying its core activities were not directly impacted by trade tariffs imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 消息人士称欧盟将提议在 2027 年底前禁止进口俄罗斯天然气
item.description: 三位欧盟官员告诉路透社记者，欧盟将于周二公布计划，在今年年底前禁止新的俄罗斯天然气交易，并在 2027 年底前逐步取消与莫斯科的现有合同。【原文：The European Union will publish plans on Tuesday to ban new Russian gas deals by the end of the year, and phase out existing contracts with Moscow by end-2027, three EU officials told Reuters.】

item.title: DoorDash 将以 39 亿美元收购英国 Deliveroo
item.description: DoorDash 和 Deliveroo 两家公司周二表示，将以 29 亿英镑（约合 38.5 亿美元）的价格收购英国送餐公司 Deliveroo，这也是美国在线外卖平台进军国际市场计划的一部分。【原文：DoorDash will buy British meal delivery firm Deliveroo for 2.9 billion pounds ($3.85 billion), the companies said on Tuesday, as a part of the U.S. online delivery platform's plans to expand into international markets.】

item.title: 雨果博斯公布第一季度收入高于预期
item.description: 德国时尚集团 Hugo Boss 周二公布的季度收入好于预期，并确认了全年业绩预期。【原文：German fashion group Hugo Boss reported a better-than-expected quarterly revenue on Tuesday and confirmed its full-year forecast.】
